mapper.select: select serialno "serialno", customerno "customerno", orgcustomerno "orgcustomerno", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", ismember "ismember", invitecode "invitecode", status "status", failuretime "failuretime", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime", issendsms "issendsms" from cas.invite_code where serialno = #{serialno} for update

select serialno "serialno", customerno "customerno", orgcustomerno "orgcustomerno", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", ismember "ismember", invitecode "invitecode", status "status", failuretime "failuretime", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime", issendsms "issendsms" from cas.invite_code where serialno = #{serialno}

select serialno "serialno", customerno "customerno", orgcustomerno "orgcustomerno", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", ismember "ismember", invitecode "invitecode", status "status", failuretime "failuretime", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime", issendsms "issendsms" from cas.invite_code where serialno = #{serialno}
mapper.insert:
insert into cas.invite_code( serialno,customerno,orgcustomerno,certificatetype,certificateno, ismember,invitecode,status,failuretime,insertdate, inserttime,updatedate,updatetime,issendsms ) values
( #{item.serialno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.orgcustomerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.certificatetype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.certificateno, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ismember, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.invitecode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.status, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.failuretime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.issendsms, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
